definition: line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: The invention relates to a main part of a seeder in agricultural machinery.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及农业机械中播种机的一种主要部件。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to an agricultural machine, particularly a rice thresher which uses a motor or a diesel engine as a power device.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型涉及一种农业机械，特别是一种打稻机。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a multifunctional thresher which belongs to an implement working on fields in agricultural machinery.
sentences.chinese: 多功能脱粒机属于农业机械中的场上作业机具。

sentences.english: The utility model discloses a walking type seeding-planting machine in the agricultural machinery field.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型公开了农业机械领域的一种步行式插秧机。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to agricultural machinery, is a rice thresher.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型涉及农业机械，是一种脱稻机。

sentences.english: And the effect of application of CADI in the agricultural machinery was also introduced.
sentences.chinese: 同时还介绍了CADI在农业机械领域的应用效果。

sentences.english: Agricultural robot is one of the developmental trends in agricultural machinery in the 21st century.
sentences.chinese: 农业机器人是21世纪农业机械的发展趋势之一。

sentences.english: The state encourages the provision of trans-regional agricultural machinery services.
sentences.chinese: 国家鼓励跨行政区域开展农业机械作业服务。

sentences.english: The invention provides an agricultural machine, in particular a mountain terracing machine.
sentences.chinese: 本发明提供一种农业机械，一种山地埂行机。

sentences.english: Mainly engaged in grain and oil machinery and agricultural machinery.
sentences.chinese: 主要经营粮油机械和农业机械。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a holding-type rice thresher which belongs to a working implement on fields in agricultural machinery.
sentences.chinese: 夹持式水稻脱粒机属于农业机械中的场上作业机具。

sentences.english: Undergraduate Student, Dept. of Agricultural Machinery Engineering, National Chung- Hsing University.
sentences.chinese: 国立中兴大学农业机械工程学系大学部学生。

sentences.english: The single-wheel walking tractor is a kind of promising agricultural machinery.
sentences.chinese: 独轮拖拉机是一种很有发展前途的农业机械。

definition: modernization of agriculture, one of Deng Xiaoping's Four Modernizations
computer numerical control machine tool (CNC machine tool)
